Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: aur tum ko kya maaloom ki vah khadakhadaane vaalee kya hai
jis din log (maidaane hashr mein) tiddiyon kee tarah phaile honge
aur pahaad dhunakee huee rooee ke se ho jaenge
to jisake (nek aamaal) ke palle bhaaree honge
vah man bhaate aish mein honge
aur jinake aamaal ke palle halke honge
aur tumako kya maaloom haaviya kya hai
